attributes.action: Prostrate screening for all men over a certain age,
attributes.additional_details:
Whilst there has been increased success with diagnosing this illness and much financial support, surely early diagnosis is great for the individual giving greater chance of survival.

Most people today have heard of someone that has prostrate cance, now is the time for action and screening.
attributes.background: I have in a small group of men 5 diagnosed with prostrate cancer, sadly one of these guys has already passed away which has led this idea for a screening programmed.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure what age you would like the screening programme to start.

You may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/227615

Or you could start a new petition setting out a different age range.
